title: Sales Outreach Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are looking for a Sales Outreach Virtual Assistant to support outbound sales efforts for a digital marketing business. The ideal candidate is resourceful, proactive, and confident in conducting cold outreach to generate leads and schedule meetings. You won’t be responsible for closing sales, but you’ll play a critical role in driving top-of-funnel activity by representing the business owner in initial communications across email, LinkedIn, and other platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

Build targeted lead lists of potential clients based on fit criteria
Send a consistent volume of outreach messages via email and LinkedIn
Scrape platforms like LinkedIn, Reddit, and other channels to identify potential prospects (e.g., founders/business owners seeking marketing support)
Manage and schedule meetings with qualified leads


Requirements:
Proven experience with outbound lead generation or sales outreach
Strong written communication skills in English
Comfortable using LinkedIn, email, and scraping tools
Highly organized and self-motivated with excellent time management
Able to follow detailed instructions and represent another professional in a consistent, authentic way
